text: David Rudman (April 13, 1943 â€“ February 8, 2022) was a Russian-American wrestler, Sambo world champion, and judo European champion. He won two gold medals at the European Judo Championships in 1969 and 1970. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Russian wrestlers Category:American wrestlers Category:Judoka Category:American martial artists Category:Sambo practitioners
